ELEMENT.CREATOR: JT
ELEMENT.SHORT: Contains 2 HTML text boxes, 1 image and 2 verical product lists.
ELEMENT.TITLE: 2 vertical product lists with 1 images and 2 texts
ELEMENT.SUMMARY: A Large image at the top followed by a HTML editor. Two prodlists listing vertically in a 1 - 3 column layout follow. At the bottom of the page is another HTML editor. The 'mutliple page' feature is disabled on this layout. Subcategories on pages using this layout will be displayed in a three column layout and will display on the subcategory pages (that use this flow) if no subcats are present there.

ELEMENT.HTML: <% load($cat_pretty); default(""); print(); %>
<table width="100%" cellspacing=2 cellpadding=2><tr> <td valign="top" align="left" colspan=2><div align="center">
